Description:
Detects usage of the "Import-Module" cmdlet to load the "Microsoft.ActiveDirectory.Management.dl" DLL. Which is often used by attackers to perform AD enumeration.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Active Directory Enumeration Using AD Module - ProcCreation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%import-module %' or command like '%ipmo %') and command like '%microsoft.activedirectory.management.dll%' and ((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')))
